Description: Body sherd of Chian, possibly Simple Animal Style, pottery chalice with cul and part of handle; white slip; interior: glazed streaky brown with two bands in added white; exterior: on wall painted decoration consisting possibly of front paw of sphinx to right; outside of handle glazed; below, band; inscription on exterior.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Aphrodite (Naukratis), Context Φ8
Curator's comments: ɸ8 is written in pencil on the interior surface of the sherd.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0918) (phase 2)
